LanguageData.SapientAnimalControl.label: sapience
LanguageData.SapientAnimalControl.description: Sapience represents how much humanity a former human has left. If it gets too low, they will become feral, potentially irreversibly.
LanguageData.Chemical_TFPlant.label: mutaplant
LanguageData.Chemical_TFPlant.description: This person is under the strange effects of mutagenic plants. They will require more (which will change them), but failure to keep them sated will push them over the edge.
